name: Dino Safari: Evolution TV
description:
​On Jurassic Safari adventures like this you will discover wild and deadly dino carnivores:

TRex, Spinosaurus, Velociraptors, Stegosaurus, Raptors, Euoplocephalus Triceratops, Pterodactyl, Dilophosaurus, Parasaurolophus, Brontosaurus, Gigantic Worm, Plesiosaur, Compsognathus, Allosaurus, Dunkleosteus and Sarcosuchus.

Build up your weapon supplies: A handgun for close encounters, a jeep rifle for sniper action, lay Mines to trap dinosaurs and the ones hunting you those Gas Canisters are very useful. Upgrade your Pistol - Crossbow(Explosive Arrows) and you equipped with a Compound Bow.

Dino Safari: Evolution has High quality graphics and gameplay.

An Adventurer in this deadly world can travel by Horse your faithful friend - Whistle to Call, Jeep using your sniper skills for those amazing long distance kills, Motorbike can be quick and fun, some like to travel by boat or those who just prefer to walk or maybe run!

Night time is a dangerous time to be in this prehistoric world, gather logs in the daytime and find supplies, then build a camp fire and stay close.

On top of a canyon your find a Zip line for those fast escapes or collect a magic mirror portal.
